Nekhen was by far the most powerful center in predynastic egypt. Shortly after the arrival of chalcolithic pioneers â‹3900BC, Nekhen became an enormous city by 3500 BC.  

The predynastic Nekhen zoo and [circus](circus.html) must have left a lasting impression on the Egyptian culture.
